Perceptor/Darkfate:

Perceptor sent several encoded information to Darkfate, the male 
dragon recieve it and send follow menssage to Perceptor "Thanks for 
the information, you're free to act."

Darkfate told to Killfest, "an attack to Maximals would be an 
invitation to Alliance to attack us... look this " he sais while he 
typed some buttons and the attack to CF appeared in a screen, and 
showed Alliance's members helping Maximals " My probes are around and 
you can see that Alliance are helping Maximals and some Trainers are 
around... we should attack the Trainers... we have to do a plan," The 
dragon opened his com link to Drill bit "Drill bit, come with 
Destron's Commader, we have to do a plan for our next attack... We 
have to be sure that Zardus won't help Trainers... So we have to ask 
him about..."  



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest looks at Darkfate for his opinion on attacking the 
Maximals.
> He had thought that they were going to go for the Trainers, but as
> long as there was someone to kill, Killfest didn't really care.
	
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Hot Rod/Epyon::
> > 
> > They both look around for bots to smash.
> > (Any one can come fight them.)
> > 
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > "DarkFate, should we go attack the Maximals too?"
